trans-unit.source: The SOAP representation of a server error.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器錯誤的 SOAP 表示法。

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, a SoapHeaderException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web 服務用戶端將 SOAP 標頭加入至具有的 XML Web 服務方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性設定為`true`，XML Web 服務方法必須設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>屬性`true`，否則 SoapHeaderException 就會擲回。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A> property cannot be set according to the SOAP specification for a SoapHeaderException.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A>無法設定屬性，根據 SOAP 規格的 SoapHeaderException。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Applications that use the SOAP 1.1 specification as the service protocol can use the SoapHeaderException to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 使用 SOAP 1.1 規格的服務通訊協定可以使用來存取 SOAP 錯誤 SoapHeaderException 的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: However, applications that use the SOAP 1.2 specification must use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用 SOAP 1.2 規格的應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>至存取 SOAP 錯誤。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class with parameters for controlling serialization.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref>使用參數來控制序列化的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>包含序列化和還原序列化期間所使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A SoapHeaderException that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: SoapHeaderException，其中包含有關來源和目的地的序列化資料流的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生訊息，識別例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會設定<xref:System.Exception.Message*>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.Message*>

trans-unit.source: The type of error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生之錯誤的類型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*>

trans-unit.target: 這個參數會設定<xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是 XML Web 服務方法的 URL。

trans-unit.source: An URI that represents the role of the XML Web service in the processing of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: URI，表示處理 SOAP 訊息中的 XML Web 服務的角色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> that contains the contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<subcode>" name="<subcode>" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> ，其中包含的內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_<subcode>" name="<subcode>" href=""> </xref> SOAP 錯誤的項目。
